amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment in the Department of Homeland Security of an Undersecretary for the Private Sector and Tourism.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 108-751 to promote the Special Assistant to the Secretary for the Private Sector to an Undersecretary of Homeland Security for the Private Sector and Tourism. Makes the Undersecretary for the Private Sector and Tourism liaise with theCommerce Department on ways to increase tourism to the United States. Requires the Office of State and Local Government in the Department of Homeland Security to keep the Undersecretary advised of any activities thatimpact the private sector.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
